short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to easily synchronize your contact list from LIVE to PTU account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How does it work?

1. Click on the extension icon
2. Log in to https://robertsspaceindustries.com/
3. Log in to https://ptu.cloudimperiumgames.com/
4. Click on "Copy contacts (LIVE -> PTU)"

That's it!
All your LIVE contacts, having a PTU account, have now been added to your PTU account.
